title: Joensuu Science Park Ltd.

author: Ilkka Kakko, Joensuu Science Park Ltd.

segmentation: We are.
Coming from.
Eastern Finland you and so and our role is as original development organization is to activate collaboration between SMS and research organizations.

At the moment we have about 6 years and he is also some departments of University of you and so North Korean University of Applied Sciences in our premises daily about 1500 people are coming and working or studying in our premises.

We are member of the International Association of Science Park and we have also kind of been leading way towards the third generation science parks for more collaborative, collaborative working environments.
Our new extension will open in November.

I will show a picture of it and and at the moment we are administrating about 30 development project inside our own organization including this network Oasis which is our own development project and then we have.
Also I'm in charge of ICT development program and we have also third parties in that program to be demonstrated.
What we are really doing we are.

Trying to create modern collaborative working environments itself so we haven't got that much industrial background, but what we are trying to do and going to do is create new generation of real collaborative working environments.
That's why we are so interested about participating in Accolade as well.
We have this hope it space thinking, first time ever.
I think it's going to be implemented in our premises.
It means that we have been planning the physical space.
And the digital phase space at the same time, and they will be put together in this Oasis.
So you can be there physically or virtually as easy as possible so that the collaboration could be easy wherever you are online.
And we have all these equally as much as we think we have all these accolades.

Element elements presented, we have always Stripe, which is a PVC we have Oasis which we think it's this virtual breeding environment, which Organism printing environment and we have always this way of working which is kind of way to think about virtual organization management.
In this we are mostly concentrating on PVC and some parts also baby and then we have a lot of challenges.
And also emerging methods and business areas like Networking, Basin serendipity, management.
And facilitation trust management.
Inspiring environment.
Trying to create this and we have done this already for more than three years and we are proud to show you that.
In November we will have this kind of working environment there in your answer, which is the capacity about 80 to 100 people.
At one moment, people from different organizations work in the same space and you can't see it here, but also this virtual or digital environment is very much present.
We have a lot of screens, loudspeakers.
This kind of interacts and also with those people who are not present there.
Who are present online?
So this is?
Yeah it is yes.
That's Italian paint.
Yes, this is.
I don't know if it's going to be in a very busy beginning like this, but we try to get it as soon as possible.
Like this.
There is a technology which enables this to be done, but OK.
So.
